response.original_title: A Very Special Holiday: The Crane Candlelight Concert
response.overview: The Crane Chorus and Crane Symphony Orchestra of the State University of New York at Potsdam present a holiday concert conducted by Daniel Gordon and Christopher Lanz. The Christmas and seasonal selections include "O Come All Ye Faithful," "Deck the Halls," "Christmas Day: A Choral Fantasy on Old Carols," "The First Noel," "Hanukkah Festival Overture," and "Hark, the Herald Angels Sing."
response.title: A Very Special Holiday: The Crane Candlelight Concert
